channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- NextCellent Gallery – NextGEN Legacy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- NextCellent Gallery – NextGEN Legacy

item.title: CVE-2022-1971|2024-08-03T00:24:44.067Z -- unknown -- nextcellent%20gallery%20%E2%80%93%20nextgen%20legacy
item.description: The NextCellent Gallery WordPress plugin through 1.9.35 does not sanitise and escape some of its image settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
